item.nacikmod.mysterious_trader_battle_c: Mysterious Trader Battle Clone Spawn Egg
item.nacikmod.magic_armor.desc1: It gives the wearer additional magical armor that protects against love influences and poisons
item.nacikmod.ring_of_time.desc1: Stop time for everyone except yourself
item.nacikmod.magic_charm.desc1: A magical amulet that grants the wearer a boost of health and a small amount of magical armor
item.nacikmod.magic_seal.desc1: Consumes mana to root enemies in a radius
item.nacikmod.magic_circuit.desc1: A magic chain that increases the player's maximum mana reserve by 50
item.nacikmod.magic_healing.desc1: The right way to use healing magic
item.nacikmod.release.desc1: Releasing magic to strengthen the body
item.nacikmod.last_magic.desc2: Takes everything in return for incredible power. Disappears after use
item.nacikmod.mana_sword.desc1: A sword that draws power from mana
item.nacikmod.magic_weapons.desc3: Right-click to shoot a mana sword projectile
item.nacikmod.magic_weapons.desc4: Shift + Right-click to create a mana sword
item.nacikmod.blood_shoot.desc1: Uses the owner's blood to deal damage
item.nacikmod.hiraishin.desc1: Moves the owner to the marked target
item.nacikmod.hiraishin.desc3: Right-click to teleport to the marked entity
item.nacikmod.hiraishin.desc4: Shift + Right-click to select a target
item.nacikmod.leonid_helmet.desc1: A Heroic Soul helmet that gives the wearer strength
item.nacikmod.gravity.desc2: Mana Cost Fly: 20/ps | Mana Cost: 500 | Effect Radius: 10 | Damage: 7/ps
item.nacikmod.sensory_rain.desc1: Causes rain that enhances sensory abilities
item.nacikmod.dark_sphere.desc1: A mysterious sphere that enhances mana regeneration
item.nacikmod.mana_blessing.desc1: Bestows a mana blessing that enhances her regeneration
item.nacikmod.pocket.desc1: Teleports living beings to a dimension
item.nacikmod.pocket.desc3: Right-click to teleport an entity to a pocket dimension
item.nacikmod.pocket.desc4: Shift + Right-click to teleport to a pocket dimension
item.nacikmod.absolute_vision.desc1: Absolute vision from which there is no escape. Night falls revealing the coordinates of all the players
item.nacikmod.breaking_body_limit.desc1: Breaks the limit of the wearer's body, enhancing his physical abilities
item.nacikmod.fire_flower.desc1: Creates fire flowers around the player
item.nacikmod.ice_prison.desc1: Closes the opponent into a cage of ice
item.nacikmod.earth_step.desc1: Creates an earthen platform under the owner and accelerates them
item.nacikmod.cursed_sword.desc1: A mana burning sword. An ability that enhances the wearer
item.nacikmod.lans_of_nacii.desc1: A spear that inflicts incurable wounds
item.nacikmod.leonid_shield.desc1: A shield that reflects increased damage to the attacker
item.nacikmod.poisoned_scythe.desc1: Scythe poisoning victims. The ability removes the effect of poisoning from victims by causing injuries
item.nacikmod.hundred_seal.desc1: The owner accumulates mana in the seal and later uses it for strong healing
item.nacikmod.slash.desc1: Air slash piercing everything in its path
item.nacikmod.double_slash.desc1: Enhanced air slash piercing everything in its path
item.nacikmod.world_slash.desc1: Slash is capable of instantly killing all living things
